#labels Usage
  # Clone the project from git using:
       `git clone https://git@github.com/jayway/powermock.git`
  # Check out version 1.5.6:
       `git checkout powermock-1.5.6`
  # Step into the `examples/tutorial/` folder and follow the instructions in the [https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jayway/powermock/powermock-1.5.6/examples/tutorial/readme.txt readme.txt] file.
